data.text: @marajanemats Hi Jane Rose. As per checking, your flight is affected by the runway closure and has been cancelled. We apologize for this inconvenience.  To view your options, please refer to this link: https://t.co/k9grG8H83W. Stay safe.

@marvinviolenta Hi marvin. Yes we do have alternate station if affected by cancelled flight CEBMNLCEB. Like DGT, BCD and ILO.  For assistance, you may also message us thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent.

@cndballesteros Hi cindy. Some of our domestic flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq.
@hellojoyce Hi Joyce. May we verify if your round trip flight is in one booking reference? If ever, you may also rebook the return for free if rebooked within 30 days from original flight date.

@justmemher Hi Rhem. This is a developing situation. Cebu Pacific is currently engaging with the authorities and will provide updates, as necessary.  You can check CEB's Travel Advisory page https://t.co/KuymGz6xXQ and our official social media pages for travel updates.

@AlunanJojo Hi Jojo Some of our flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can visit https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq. You can also check CEB's Travel Advisory https://t.co/KuymGyOoJI.

@kulotissima We regret that you feel that way Kulotissima. We're moving all of our chat engagements. For assistance & the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi & ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

data.text:
3. Refund 
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

2. Travel Fund 
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)

1. Free Rebooking 
               Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

Cebu Pacific has cancelled flights to and from Cebu because of the runway closure at the Mactan airport until 12 midnight October 25 due to a disabled aircraft of an international airline.

Here are the additional cancelled flights: https://t.co/Sb3Q2qVkGi

Cebu Pacific Advisory #4

Affected flights due to runway closure in Cebu

October 24, 2022, 1:00PM https://t.co/WOH73RXtuo

data.text:
@cerisaes We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience 
cerisa. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.
@bwuibearry We regret that you feel that way bwuibearry. Upon checking,  your case owner has sent you an email on 10/21/2022 10:27 AM. You may send your response there.

@prettycarrot Hi bunny. This is a developing situation. Cebu Pacific is currently engaging with the authorities and will provide updates as necessary. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOd8mq.

@yekatoong Hi Yeka. Some of our flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, visit https://t.co/n8RpsOd8mq. You can also check CEB's Travel Advisory page https://t.co/KuymGz6xXQ.
@hellojoyce Hi Joyce, apologies as your flight is affected by the runway closure and has been cancelled. To view your options, please refer to this link: https://t.co/k9grG8Zhi4. Stay safe.
Cebu Pacific is currently engaging with the authorities and will provide updates as necessary.

For those travelling from October 24-25 and who wish to voluntarily postpone their flights, they may avail of Cebu Pacific's flexible options which include free rebooking and travel fund, up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.

data.text:
3. Refund  
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

2. Travel Fund  
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)

1. Free Rebooking  
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

5J 140/141   Cebu – Boracay – Cebu 

DG 6573/6574   Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu 

5J 553/554  Manila-Cebu-Manila

@katibabybra Hi Katipunerang! Passenger should check in for a flight. You have the option to claim your boarding pass via online check in or mobile app or Check-In Kiosk. You may visit https://t.co/ojS0Jc8OJr for more information.

data.text: @simplyannasui You're most welcome Anna A! See you on board soon!

@tessgarcia We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent Patatas of Mindanao. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

@simplyannasui Hi Anna. You can bring a snorkel in your hand carry, as long as it follows dimensions for hand carry. Learn more here https://t.co/A4HuYKXZM4. If you're bringing more scuba/diving equipment, we recommend to purchase CEB Sports Equipment to ensure proper storage while inflight.

data.text: @GDforshort Hi @GDforshort! Jam may be included in your checked baggage. Please make sure it's sealed and packed properly to avoid spillage. Thank you
@mmarcoae Appreciate if you can send us the Customer Care Reference Number so this can be endorsed to a handler. Thank you

@mmarcoae We are sorry to hear your frustrations, @mmarcoae. Thank you as well for raising the concern. To look into the concern further, please send us the screenshot/s thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XT0nnK). Thank you
@Olidelapaz Hi Olivia! Minor may present the old school ID together with a copy of her PSA Birth Certificate. Thank you

@normspanlasigui Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Norman. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@kjaneee_ Hi kjaneee. We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wEvz3 . Or, send us a private message through: https://t.co/gNaqWVnZKE. Thanks!
